Reviews.Title: “Location, price, quality - Beldes has it all!”

Reviews.Content: 8 blocks vatican block subway perfect impressed hotel late 11pm hotel 24 hours nice escorted shown keys wished evening gentleman spoke english found else italian poor free included breakfast nice selection mix continental breakfast proper coffee security hotel top bad honestly beautiful stayed buildings stayed building slightly usa standards recognize actually rome bathroom wonderful shower hotel matter clean daily maid service quiet night didnt stay main hotel view beautiful church quiet id stay building suppose worried noise notice main hotel looked walk breakfast location price cheap close restaurants pretty menu search eat italy

Reviews.Title: “Not good enough for the price.”
Reviews.Author: elifsy
Reviews.Content: hotel close metro station walk distance vatican nice 1st floor close couple steps breakfast single rumour breakfast bed stuff carried pieces baggage woman carried checkout breakfast poor wait 15 minutes teacoffee arrive stuff rude double bed reservation poorly attached twin bed seperated movement spent honeymoon hotel pretty disturbing

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for young couples”
Reviews.Author: LadBroke8
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 days nov 2011 husband time rome excited stay boutique hotel city pros 1 hotel 7min walk lepanto metro station 2 buffet breakfast day consisting selection breads cereals cold cuts cheese 3 hotel clean looked freshly below tiny overlooked details 4 staff friendly accommodating ready help cons 1 hotel look remodeled hear people thin walls ie walking hardwood floor flushing toilet draining tub door walls tiny hole electrical outlet supposed placed elsewhere minor details lived addressed run 2 prepared stay doesnt look exactly advertised decorated basic amenities remain en suite bathshower etc price recommend wishing stay rome

Reviews.Title: “Location,location,location...”
Reviews.Author: Susied60
Reviews.Content: stayed weekend jan lovely hotel round corner lepanto tube station reach major attractions rome offer quickly cheaply subway easy navigate lines cant wrong terravision bus airport 4 euro termini tube lepanto 1 euro walked 250 metres paying exhorbitant taxi fares staff hotel friendly helpful thoroughly enjoyed stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good”
Reviews.Author: Pawel_EPWR
Reviews.Content: near metro station vatican 10 minute walk extremely helpful friendly desk staff clean sheets towels changed daily basis breakfast nice leisure sit chat reception desk

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, great stay”
Reviews.Author: Jessica L
Reviews.Content: loved hotel clean updated breakfast wonderful staff friendly help stayed hotel annex block loved stay closed subway stop easy city recommend

Reviews.Title: “A bit disappointing.”
Reviews.Author: UandB
Reviews.Content: picked hotel internet looked clean value money yes clean convenient vatican else restaurants informed arrival lovely reception noisy changed basement downside little natural light tree outside window day vending machines available glasses drink bathrooms lighting poor

Reviews.Title: “Thin walls, made to walk to some dodgy apartment building”
Reviews.Author: Londres_Dave
Reviews.Content: hotel intention cheap arrived pokey reception soon realise socialising hotel lack couches relax chat downer told booked special thinking led outside hotel 1 block dodgy apartment building quaint apartment converted hotel obviously disappointed actual hotel booked soon noted corridor pokey walls thin decor cheaply shower leaked water bathroom breakfast decent breakfast boiling overall stay isnt expected value money decent location

Reviews.Title: “PERFECT !”
Reviews.Author: NadiaSoraiaSantos
Reviews.Content: lovely hotel beautiful location near vaticano bathroom decoration comfortable people nice friendly helped contact taxi care bags check enjoy day city hotel terrace floor guests breakfast lot options indoor garden clean calm love hotel rome stay surely doubt

Reviews.Title: “Didn't want to leave!! Exceptional”
Reviews.Author: Natsalvo26
Reviews.Content: hotel stayed 6 week stay italy initial greeting warm maps explanations etc escorted 2 minute walk hotelit stunning own apartment preferred actually staying hotel spotless style black white bathroom beautifulbut loved rain shower shower head water pressure fantastic free wifi code online 247 7 convenient nice touch compared paying extravagant internet prices breakfast lovely definitely fresh danish pastries juices coffee tipget breakfastthe breakfast fills cleaned daily exceptional standard possibly cleanest ive showers cleaned fresh fluffy bar stocked staff friendly helpful nearby choices restaurantsbars gelaterias 5 minute walk main leading shopsa supermarket leading vatican 10 mins sights location departure late checkout told meant didnt rush left luggage storage reception lovely limousine transfer booked €55 airport taxi cost €60 fantastic service cant wait return partner loved style spoke days love stay dependance chance view roomsand pictures styles owners doing fantastic

Reviews.Title: “Nice modern unique place but needs a few tweaks (great potential)!”
Reviews.Author: Marie N
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights potential hotel modern nice funky decor traditional italian thats looking 15 minute walk vatican city local tube station round corner easy clean comfortable rated average feel lots impression bar hotel perfect roof terrace nice reception explained bar vending machine basement floor stocked cans beer mini bar price list hotel booklet mini bar initially stocked arrival reception told vending machines basement floor snacks water funny 2 wardrobes drawers unpack hanging clothes roof terrace lovely empty top floor outside bit unfinished building wasnt actually allowed looked unfinished building real bar breakfast 24 hour reception

Reviews.Title: “perfecto”
Reviews.Author: damirubyjones
Reviews.Content: looked smart outside entry trendy boutique hotel staff hotel fantastic providing information visits eat drink annex situated stones throw main hotel clean nicely decorated possibly needi beautiful romantic breakfast amazing set day city pastries gorgeous cakes meats cheeses fruit eat greati looking forward breakfast sum amazing staywe loved staff owners holiday little gem thank team danielle

Reviews.Title: “Trendy hotel in a quiet neighborhood”
Reviews.Author: clevelandtravelgirl
Reviews.Content: stayed april close metro near vatican city touristy metro makes easy walk picture gallery trendy modern deluxe larger bathroom couple english channels regular items repainted walls marked showers provide conditioner selections breakfast selection staff friendly except day person unhelpful didnt internet cafes couldnt people downside hotel hallways stairs carpeted makes noisey night hear warned light sleeper

Reviews.Title: “Very poor service!!”
Reviews.Author: leediax
Reviews.Content: unfortunately owner hotel lied weve arrived friendly chat owner hope settle theyve offered suite extra 10 euros pay course reception weve found suite doesnt exist charge 10 euros extra night please enjoy stay amazing

Reviews.Title: “Just decent”
Reviews.Author: Pupinek
Reviews.Content: location 15 min walk vatican city 5 min walk metro station staff friendly helpful hotel trendy clean nicely decorated space bed walls repainted time tv english channel italian tv people screaming shouting crying knees totally crazy breakfast slow service internet slow

Reviews.Title: “beldes rome”
Reviews.Author: piotrkoczara
Reviews.Content: staff helpful polite clean spacious expecting peoples reviews wasnt double bed tv section sofa tv nicely decorated comfy bed nice tv programmes original language read sky manual location brisk 7 min walk vatican 20 min 10 euro taxi river campo dei metro station round corner arent sound proofed hear doors etc wasnt night hotel quiet breakfast service bit slow arrived time

Reviews.Title: “good hotel, not very touristy.”
Reviews.Author: mustaqtvpm
Reviews.Content: hotel situated quiet rome safe typical roman style maintained service staff helpful quiet supper satisfy whats available choices travel bit sight seeing near hotel

Reviews.Title: “Would I recommend this hotel? Probably not.”
Reviews.Author: traceyb_856
Reviews.Content: arrival initial impressions interior main entrance nice appeared reflect boutique pictures keys 9a 1st floor unable locate girl reception led door tiny converted store additional double bed pushed window unable walk round lick paint walls scuffed bathroom bath shower unit clean breakfast ok bit disappointing i’m honest service slow coffee weak hotel it’s self located vatican close metro station fortunately fantastic trip enjoyed short stay rome probably

Reviews.Title: “Bitter Sweet”
Reviews.Author: confusedcarrot
Reviews.Content: husband visited hotel honeymoon informed hotel arrived friendly ease reception nicely decorated dark overly special tea coffee am usually bothered cup tea staff lovely cleanliness standard breakfast varied roof top terrace enjoy own drink food drink paid 15 euro wine beer location isnt 10 min walk vatican dont hotel value paid £450 3 night stay wasnt worth overall disappointed

Reviews.Title: “a little gem”
Reviews.Author: carl6789
Reviews.Content: hi stopover partner found hotel clean friendly 4min walk lepanto metro added hotel roof terrace 15 min walk vatican pick bus tours hour walking hotel oasis thankyou nice stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for a tourist”
Reviews.Author: Draytondave
Reviews.Content: greeted shown hospitality john owners feel comfortable stay location sight seeing metro bus services corner clean breakfast spread bar lounge till 800 pm day sight seeing liked roof top terrace

Reviews.Title: “nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel located close lepanto metro station personnel helpful equipped looking hotel stil ok coffee morning instant coffee looking italian espresso try terrace staying rome days managed visit lot due advance booking tickets – ie vatican

Reviews.Title: “Beldes guest house - a hidden gem!”
Reviews.Author: 187069Liz
Reviews.Content: stayed guest house month reading reviews little unsure expect honestly truely lovely clean inviting hotel location beaten track speak nice hustle bustle touristy 10 minute walk vatican city metro station stones throw soon arrived helped luggage upgraded poster bed extra charge staff friendly happy assist enquiry clean decor hotel fab boutique hotel breakfast plentiful served lovely fab decor roof terrace haven peace tranquility days sightseeing dont negative comments hotel deffinitely worth stay recommended friends family

Reviews.Title: “Geat Hotel, Great Location.”
Reviews.Author: DarinDublinIreland
Reviews.Content: rome night stay hotel hr tell former hotel manager am bit picky properties stay words hotel name tripadvisor looked reviews pleasantly surprised property spotlessly clean friendly staff quality breakfast partner adequate clean bathroom bit serves purpose property located busy day evening bit tourist beaten track believe bad located west tiber river close vatican city metro stops lovely restaurants wont cost earth eat hotel newish modern art walls corridors leading bedrooms property newish world type furniture bedrooms hidden gem boutique style hotel makes property little bit special impersonal hotel breakfast lovely usual continental fair sliced meats cheeses juices cakes fresh coffee word warning breakfast located 2nd floor busy dont tourists eating plague monday friday 8am ish weekends im reception staff knowledgeable tourist maps hand recommend local restaurants value metro station lepanto rear hotel stops east tiber tourist attractions spanish steps trevi fountains etc overall couldnt recommend hotel base easy pace city step tip buy roma pass spend days rome €25 covers metro bus tram price major tourist attractions worth penny
